body: Oh, that's the guy who did Brandish. I knew I had seen that style somewhere before. So now he is doing a K-On hardcore edition, nice. Just felt a bit short though, the Band story could have been longer.
Came back because that twintail girl makes my dick feel really nice <3
Ok this is great and my dick is sore now. I can take the little brown haired slut as a replacement for Twiska
